title: Two injured in Dhadar blast near irrigation office - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
DERA MURAD JAMALI: Two people were injured in an explosion near the irrigation office in the Dhadar area of Kachhi district late on Sunday night, police said.

Officials said unidentified miscreants had plan­ted an explosive device near the office, which detonated as two passersby were nearby.

The injured were identified as Lal Muhammad Mastoi and Mir Hassan Jatoi.

Police and Levies personnel reached the site and shifted the injured to the district hospital in Dhadar for medical treatment.

The blast also shattered windowpanes of the irrigation office and nearby buildings.

Secu­rity forces have launched a search operation in the area to trace the perpetrators.

Published in Dawn, July 28th, 2025
